<style>
:root {
  --theme-main: #2b864b;
  --theme-bg: #f5f6fa;
  --theme-card-bg: #fff;
  --theme-card-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(43,134,75,0.10);
  --theme-border: #e3e7ed;
}

body {
  background: var(--theme-bg);
  margin: 0;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

.header-section {
  font-size: 2.6rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #2b864b;
  margin-bottom: 1.1rem;
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
}

.member-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(6, 1fr);
  gap: 1rem;
  width: 100%;
}

.profile-link {
  display: contents;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
  height: 100%;
}

.member-grid-item {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: flex-start;  
  align-items: stretch;
  background: var(--theme-card-bg);
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: var(--theme-card-shadow);
  border: 1.5px solid var(--theme-border);
  padding: 0.5rem;
  text-align: center;
  transition: transform 0.13s, box-shadow 0.13s;
  cursor: pointer;
  height: 260px;              
  width: 170px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.member-grid-item:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.025);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(43,134,75,0.15);
  border-color: var(--theme-main);
}

.member-grid-image {
  width: 84px;
  height: 84px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 50%;
  margin: 0 auto 0.6rem auto;
  border: 3px solid var(--theme-main);
  background: #d5f5e3;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 6px rgba(43,134,75,0.12);
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.member-grid-position {
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: #70877c;
  margin-bottom: 0.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.member-grid-name {
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #212c2b;
  margin-bottom: 0.3rem;
  line-height: 1.2;
  min-height: 2.6em;  
  max-height: 2.9em;  
  display: flex;
  align-items: center; 
  justify-content: center;
  text-align: center;
}

.member-grid-org {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  color: #45695f;
  margin-bottom: 0.2rem;
}

.member-grid-faculty {
  font-size: 0.80rem;
  color: #70877c;
  margin-bottom: 0.1rem;
}

.member-socials {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: right;
  padding-top: 0.2rem;
}

.social-link {
  display: inline-flex;         
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: none;              
  box-shadow: none;               
  color: #2b864b;                 
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 1.4rem;              
  width: auto;                  
  height: auto;                 
  border: none;                  
  border-radius: 0;              
  padding: 0;                   
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.social-link:hover {
  color: #BEE3F8;                
  background: none;               
}

.social-link i {
  font-size: inherit;           
  margin: 0;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

</style>
